jobs.title: Information Technology Intern
description: Decommissioned retired laptops and staged 200+ laptops by using Ivanti to install essential software, configure authentication, and remotely push security patches and shipped devices on schedule
Coordinated with clients to schedule remote sessions via Screen Connect to resolve various PC and technical support issues
Tracked laptop setup progress with custom Excel sheets and Track-It!, and communicated updates to team leads using Teams and Outlook

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Created a Dart Flutter app that stored food items by scanning barcodes and generated AI recipes
Created a backend Python server that controlled login and API calls
Managed Apple TestFlight and organized GitHub tasks for team programming workflows
Led the programming team and collaborated with design and management

jobs.title: Prototype Programmer
description: Led a team of programmers, artists, and designers to create multiple video game prototypes
Used Unity to create 3D video games using C#

jobs.title: Camp Counselor
description: Supervised and ensured the safety and well-being of children aged 5-12
Certified in CPR and First Aid
Planned, organized, and led age-appropriate activities

jobs.title: Production / Technical Director
description: Created management software for the station, including calendar, contacts, texting, and basic AI
Designed and hosted Indie Spotlight specialty show every week, including music and breaks
Upgraded station with new ENCO servers and boards

jobs.title: Level 3 Hockey Referee
description: Officiated over 250 USA hockey games, including Bantam, Pee Wee, and Squirt levels
Referee and Linesman for 16U/18U hockey games
